data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AfHySvkMqIQQ7kNvgEnozz1&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD0TJsxNRGkSe7LAZUhE_Nih96c7RKfsE5mtnof4IupOw&oe=670272B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kUAlDx0pZpEQ7kNvgFUgaWo&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDd4oJQUa3tZmeA4-cT65LWCES1dntniT8JfVKy1uPmhQ&oe=67028052)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=eqE7aM7jzNIQ7kNvgHt0nO9&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBzcKo5N2LDtJ16ukjyRWFXnFF1ScVCWWE6gFuNso3mTg&oe=67026B89)
